title: The Avengers Are in 'The Leftovers,' Plus Netflix's 'Russian Doll' | The Watch (Ep. 326)
description:
The Super Bowl was a snooze, but at least we got to see Steve Carell shilling Pepsi (5:30) and an Avengers trailer (14:42). Netflix’s new comedy ‘Russian Doll’ is the perfect show for the streaming service (27:35).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Read Alison Herman’s review of ‘Russian Doll’ here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
